Class TimeControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • TimeControl
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OutcomeControl

    public class TimeControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    nelsoncs TimeControl is a barebones incremental time controller for the game Hopefully, it can be replaced with a concurrent time controller at some point to give a more realistic experience
